about_the_game:
WARNING:

The game's content includes sudden loud noises, flashing lights, violent elements, and bloody scenes that may disturb some players. These elements are left to the player's discretion, and caution is advised during the experience.

About the Game:

Isaac has a detective career full of failures. To make ends meet and pay his bills, he accepts small and insignificant cases. One day, he receives a mysterious letter that leads him to a life-changing task. Isaac is asked to investigate an isolated and abandoned house, and he initially thinks the job will be easy and profitable. However, the moment he steps into the house, things quickly take a turn. In this seemingly abandoned place, supernatural entities and dark forces are waiting for him. Isaac is no longer just a detective but a man fighting for survival.

As Isaac progresses through this enigmatic house, each step pulls him deeper into a darker and more sinister mystery. As the player, you must help Isaac uncover the house's secrets by solving puzzles that test both his mental and physical endurance. While exploring hidden rooms, dark basements, and fear-filled sections, Isaac will encounter dangers that are not only physical but also psychological. Though Isaac initially wants to escape, every clue he uncovers and every mystery he solves will pull him deeper into the house, driving him to continue pursuing the truth.

Gameplay:

In this first-person perspective game, you will witness Isaac's struggle for survival in a dark and eerie house. As the player, you must solve puzzles using the clues and mysterious objects you find in the house, unlocking closed sections to help Isaac escape. While the puzzles are logic-based, the oppressive atmosphere of the house and the supernatural entities you encounter will make solving them even more challenging. As Isaac uncovers each secret, he will gain access to more resources and discover new ways to survive. However, each solution will drag him further into the house's deeper and more dangerous sections.

Key Features:

A story-driven, single-player experience offering deep immersion.

Hidden rooms, mysterious basements, and fear-filled sections to explore throughout the game.

Logic-based puzzles: Solve codes, find objects, and combine items to complete various tasks.

A tension-filled atmosphere: A world full of supernatural entities and psychological horrors awaits.

Learn how to cope with the threats Isaac faces as you progress through the story and try to survive.

Setting:

An abandoned and eerie house filled with dark secrets lurking in every corner. As Isaac ventures deeper, he will face increasing tension and danger.

Note:

This game is based on a true story.

content_descriptors.notes: The game's story contains elements that may disturb some players, such as loud and sudden sounds, flashing lights, violent elements and images of blood and gore. It is left to the discretion of the player.
